title: mulitimc启动游戏出现：进程退出，代码：-1求大佬帮忙
author: daiyuhun
txt_content:
我在用mulitimc启动游戏的时候提示我
CPU @ 2.40GHz
[20:27:14] [Client thread/INFO] [STDOUT]: [net.minecraft.init.Bootstrap:func_179870_a:560]: #@!@# Game crashed! Crash report saved to: #@!@# D:\主文件\新建文件夹\MultiMC\instances\Forever Stranded-1.9.9.1\minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2018-05-20_20.27.12-client.txt
2018-05-20 20:27:19,539 ERROR Attempted to append to non-started appender FmlSysOut
Exception in thread "Thread-0" AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
进程退出，代码：-1。
？？？？？？？？全脸蒙逼大家直达这是咋回事么？注：整合包用繁华大大的下载器下载的。第一次启动

replies.author: 123hhhhhh
replies.txt_content: 先把英文扔翻译里，翻译一下，你安装java了吗，怀疑缺少文件
